UpdateLog.description: Small Bug FixesTiny - Graphic Overlays with patterns not rendering properly for blueprint placement. - Raiders still attacking vehicles with no pawns inside if turret was set to auto-target - Vehicles not deregistering from cover grid when rotating. - Vehicles could spawn out of bounds at certain angles when arriving with vanilla-chosen spawn position. - Mods using vanilla targeter such as 'Rimworld of Magic' and 'Eccentric Extras - Flares' would prevent vehicle targeters from starting. This included aerial launch targeting. Performance OptimizationTiny - Targeters don't run unless activated. Additional ChangesTiny - Added 1st iteration of raiders, locked behind a toggle in the mod settings. Note: This is an experimental feature, you may encounter bugs or horrible game balance. This feature is opt-in while it remains experimental. Vehicles that are not configured for raids, won't spawn in them. If you have no vehicles that can spawn in raids, then you won't get vehicle raids. - Vehicles can be temporarily disabled by EMPs. Players - Vehicles consume 50% less fuel while idle - Added more entries to vehicle info cards including build costs, total health, turrets, etc. Modders - Added NPC Properties for configuring vehicles in raids. - Added affectedByEMP bool to vehicle properties. - FireMode shotsPerBurst and ticksBetweenBursts are now IntRange, allowing for varied burst counts and varied timing between bursts to make machine gun fire less robotic. Final NotesTiny Please report any issues you find on either https://discord.gg/zXDyfWQ(discord) or https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicle-Framework/issues(github).
